Tridi - JavaScript 3D Image Viewer

Simple, powerful and easily customizable JavaScript library for 3D visualizations based on series of images.

Install from npm

npm install tridi

Manual build

git clone https://github.com/lukemnet/tridi
npm install
npm run build

Download

  • Source code — contains full uncompiled TypeScript source code
  • Compiled version — contains unminified JS source code with verbose mode available
  • Compressed version — minified JS source code with verbose mode available
  • Production-ready version — minified JS source code, no verbose mode

Quick start

Add Tridi script on your site:

<script src="path/to/tridi.js"></script>

For minimum styling add tridi.css to head section of your page:

<link rel="stylesheet" href="path/to/tridi.css">
